list_definition.definition: to offer oneself for a particular task, of one’s own free will (often without being paid for such work)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He volunteered to act as messenger.

list_definition.definition: to offer (eg an opinion, information etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Two or three people volunteered suggestions.

list_definition.mean_english: quân tình nguyện, lính tình nguyện
list_definition.definition: a person who offers to do, or does, something (especially who joins the army) of his own free will

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: If we can get enough volunteers, we shall not force people to join the Army.

list_ex_of_english: Eight million female volunteers amassed supplies for soldiers and sailors, surgical dressings and garments for refugees.
